Name: intents
Value.patterns: How can I submit a new help desk ticket?
Value.responses: Through help desk Mail Id or help desk portal

Name: intents
Value.patterns: Can you share the help desk's email ID with me?

Name: intents
Value.patterns: How to track my ticket status ?
Value.responses: Once the ticket has been created you can either login to help desk portal or simply click on 'view ticket' from the mail you have received

Name: intents
Value.patterns: How do I check the status of my existing ticket?
Value.responses: Can see in help desk portal

Name: intents
Value.patterns: What information should I include when submitting a help desk ticket?
Value.responses:
1. BU
2. phone
3. subject 
4. description of your issue 
5. priority level 
6.  classification

Name: intents
Value.patterns: When will my ticket be solved ?

Name: intents
Value.patterns: Can I add attachments or screenshots to my help desk ticket ?
Value.responses: Yes you can. In help desk portal there is attachment option. There u can add your attachments nd screenshots

Name: intents
Value.patterns: How can I provide additional information or updates to an existing ticket?
Value.responses: Through help desk portal. In that you can update your existing ticket. In view option you can see multiple sub options of your raised tickets

Name: intents
Value.patterns: How can I provide feedback the support I received for my help desk ticket?
Value.responses: In help desk portal you can see the feed back option in that you can provide your feedback.

Name: intents
Value.responses: Sorry! I can't understand you. Please provide more context or details so that I can better understand and help you
